articles.title: Trump Says US Attorney General Should Release Any 'Credible' Information On Epstein
articles.description: US President Donald Trump has stated that Attorney General Pam Bondi should release "whatever she thinks is credible" regarding late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, facing backlash from supporters after attempting to close the case. [4]

articles.title: 'American Idol' Music Supervisor And Husband Found Shot Dead In Los Angeles Home, Suspect Arrested
articles.description: A suspect has been arrested in connection with the murder of "American Idol" music supervisor Robin Kaye and her songwriter husband, Thomas Deluca, who were discovered shot to death in their Los Angeles home. [4]

articles.title: Severe summer storms head to the South and Midwest, millions under extreme weather alerts
articles.description: Dangerous weather conditions are persisting across the country, with the threat of severe summer storms moving towards the South and Midwest, placing millions of people under extreme weather alerts due to potential high winds and hail. [1]
